column3: Latest;A Cambodian woman was sentenced to 30 years in prison and fined 40 million riel over a drug importation case.------Yich Charnavy
column4: president of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court’s Trial Chamber
column5: handed down the verdict to Chit Sethan
column7: for illegally transporting drugs under Article 40 Of the Law on Drug Control.------The Ministry of Interior’s internal security department detained the suspect on 23 April 2018 at the post office in Wat Phnom
column9: Phnom Penh. Police detained the accused while she was waiting to receive the 3
column10: 400 grams of MDMA pills sent from Belgium to Cambodia via the post office of Cambodia.------Source
